title: Time Bender
tagline: A first of it's kind VR game
background: Uses ReactVR and Socket.io to create a multi-device VR experience

title: Getting Fishy
tagline: Multi-user fish store that tracks orders and inventory
background: Uses React to update and store data in real time

title: LegWork
background: This app stores application and company information, and tracks your progress to help organize your job search.

title: NYT Scraper
tagline: Search and save articles from the New York Time's archives.
background: Web Scraper that utilizes React.js and Mongoose to scrape and save articles

title: JamQuiz
tagline: Quiz your friends on your favorite jams!
background: This game utilizies Spotify's 30 second previews. Show off your music knowledge by guessing correctly and earning points.

title: Bamazon
tagline: Server-side Online Webstore made with SQL
background: Access store data as a customer, manager, or supervisor. Make purchases, add inventory, track profits across departments
